name: Haumia-Tiketike
description:
Our entry for the 2022 REGENERATE game jam, Haumia-Tiketike is a game where Joe (The player), must explore the wilds and fight dangerous monsters in order to obtain plant able seeds that can be sold for money. To hoe/pick L mb

To water RMB

To plant middle mouse button

Movement controls W A S D

To hoe/pick LMB
